data.name: Galaxy Angels - Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
This DLC for the game Galaxy Angels includes two packages.

1. Background Controller


Once installed it will give you access to the Main Menu Background controller, as you go through the game you will unlock new backgrounds which you can set as the main menu background, showing whichever unlocked image you prefer.

2. Digital Wallpaper Pack


In addition you will receive a complete set of digital wallpapers for use on your own computer as backgrounds and other items. A link to the directory that contains these images will be available at the bottom of the Background Controller in the game.

The wallpaper pack contains 25 1920x1080 images from the game.

This DLC is included as part of the Deluxe Edition Bundle
